channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Obama calls Jimmy Kimmel suspension "government coercion"
item.description: Former President Obama condemned ABC for pulling Jimmy Kimmel off the air Thursday, calling it "government coercion" by a Trump administration officia...

item.title: Charlie Kirk's death prompts Republican calls for calm as MAGA demands war
item.description: While prominent MAGA voices cried " war " and blamed the " other side " for Charlie Kirk's murder , another coalition is urging its peers to blame the...

item.title: The growing chasm between MAGA and non-MAGA Republicans on Trump's economy
item.description: There's a growing split between MAGA Republicans and non-MAGA GOP voters on the state of the economy, according to research firm Global Strategy Group...

item.title: Supreme Court to hear Trump tariff case Nov. 5, as Cook appeal looms
item.description: President Trump's economic agenda collided with the Supreme Court Thursday, as Trump asked the justices to let him fire Fed governor Lisa Cook and the...

item.title: Exclusive: FCC commissioner criticizes administration for "weaponizing" agency's authority
item.description: The Federal Communications Commission under the Trump administration is "weaponizing its licensing authority in order to bring broadcasters to heel," ...

item.title: Turning Point USA appoints Charlie Kirk’s widow as his successor
item.description: A statement from board members noted that Kirk “expressed to multiple executives that this is what he wanted in the event of his death.”

item.title: Trump affirms ‘immortal bonds’ after royal treatment in U.K.
item.description: President Trump’s trip, filled with pomp and pageantry, began with a parade on the grounds of Windsor Castle and concluded with business deals and tal...

item.title: Trump says he is working to get Afghan air base from Taliban
item.description: Such an outcome would signify a remarkable rapprochement after the U.S. fought a 20-year war against the militant group.

item.title: Effort to censure Rep. Ilhan Omar over Charlie Kirk comments fails
item.description: The effort was part of a GOP campaign to punish individuals Republicans accuse of posthumously smearing Kirk.

item.title: Trump officials ask Supreme Court to allow firing of Fed governor Lisa Cook
item.description: The case is one of a trio before the high court that will be a major test of the president’s assertion of sweeping authority over the economy and fede...

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
